::he hears rampage and he locates a computer ready to have the 
downloaded information recieved from his commander,however he was 
still curious about what megatron was saying and the causes taken 
against him however for now he knew was in a safe postion.::

Necro Enari-Ok all ready

::he flipped down a panel on his right side and saw his beautiys were 
in total preperation,the tiny microbugs in the "bullet" sized 
capsules and put in 5 capsules and put the gun on pulse for the time 
being,these capsules could capture a spark in a shell in half a solar 
cycle and apply pressure evrey cycle he inserted the right capsule 
bullets on the right side of the gun with the red mark,he did have a 
left panel on his side with more bugs..but of a diffrent type::
